verses.name: Job 30:12
verses.text: Upon my right hand rise the youth; they push away my feet, and they raise up against me the ways of their destruction.

verses.name: Job 30:13
verses.text: They mar my path, they set forward my calamity, they have no helper.

verses.name: Job 30:14
verses.text: They came upon me as a wide breaking in of waters: in the desolation they rolled themselves upon me.

verses.name: Job 30:15
verses.text: Terrors are turned upon me: they pursue my soul as the wind: and my welfare passeth away as a cloud.

verses.name: Job 30:16
verses.text: And now my soul is poured out upon me; the days of affliction have taken hold upon me.
